meanings.definition: A person who leads a life of reckless indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: The debauchees at the party danced wildly and drank excessively.
meanings.sent2: The city was known for its debauchees who frequented the nightclubs and casinos.
meanings.sent3: The debauchees in the movie were portrayed as carefree and hedonistic characters.
meanings.sent4: The debauchees in the novel were like colorful butterflies, flitting from one pleasure to the next.
meanings.sent5: The image of the debauchees laughing and feasting under the stars stayed with him.

meanings.definition: To corrupt or seduce someone morally.
meanings.sent1: He tried to debauchees her with promises of wealth and power.
meanings.sent2: The evil sorcerer sought to debauchees the young prince with dark magic.
meanings.sent3: The cunning villain plotted to debauchees the hero's loyal followers.
meanings.sent4: The forbidden fruit seemed to debauchees her innocent soul.
meanings.sent5: The twisted plot was designed to debauchees the minds of the unsuspecting townspeople.
